mapper.select: select u2.id from user u1 inner join user u2 where u1.id = u2.parent_id;

select u.id id, u.parent_id parentId, u.path path, u.level level, u.domain `domain`, u.role_id role_id, u.username username, u.email email, u.qq qq, u.phone phone, u.state state, u.create_time createTime from user u
u.path like concat('',#{path},'%')
